Technical description:
- The app demonstrates all parameters of `panel_title`: `title` and `window_title`
- The `title` parameter accepts:
  - Simple string
  - HTML Tag
  - TagList for multiple elements
- The `window_title` parameter accepts a string that appears in the browser tab
- No additional components are needed since `panel_title` is self-contained
- No external data files are used

Installation and execution instructions:
1. Install required package:
```bash
pip install shiny
```

2. Save the code in a file (e.g., `app.py`)
3. Run the app:
```bash
shiny run app.py
```

Package dependencies:
- shiny

The app showcases all possible ways to use `panel_title` in a minimal fashion without unnecessary components.
## Preview the app on [Shinylive](https://shinylive.io/py/app/#h=0&-kpyCapAFD1ytkedlIM0B50l0t54XGAP2h0NRqlmTeUG4N0iRUVNR5Vqlcx1ev2GTA-)
